channel.title: Rowing on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in Rowing on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 23 Oct 2020 00:00
item.description: Slowly getting back into the workout rhythm. With the Gym mostly all to myself in the USG housing, I’ve started rowing on the Erg. and also incorporated a few treadmill runs. Need to add in a few Ashtanga days and some long outdoor runs or bike rides during the weekend to add more flavor!
item.content:encoded: Slowly getting back into the workout rhythm. With the Gym mostly all to myself in the USG housing, I’ve started rowing on the Erg. and also incorporated a few treadmill runs. Need to add in a few Ashtanga days and some long outdoor runs or bike rides during the weekend to add more flavor!
